attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: recently the justice system has been getting more and more leanient especially to murderers. now im not jst suggesting bring back hanging because theie lowlife scum but it would also save millions of taxpayers pounds. so who do i think should be hung mass murderers,pedophiles and also for treason. the way in which i think they should be killed is the electric chair which has proved effective in the states thank-you for taking your time to read this
